name: Victorian Mysteries: Woman in White
detailed_description: A piece of world literature as a captivating hidden object thriller! As art teacher Walter Hartright, you'll be commissioned to teach the daughters of the quirky millionaire Mr. Fairlie. But on your way to the Fairlie estate, you meet a mysterious woman - and you begin to uncover a series of abysmal family secrets. This thrilling hidden object adventure effortlessly captures the stimulating atmosphere of the famous 1860 written novel by Wilkie Collins takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!
about_the_game: A piece of world literature as a captivating hidden object thriller! As art teacher Walter Hartright, you'll be commissioned to teach the daughters of the quirky millionaire Mr. Fairlie. But on your way to the Fairlie estate, you meet a mysterious woman - and you begin to uncover a series of abysmal family secrets. This thrilling hidden object adventure effortlessly captures the stimulating atmosphere of the famous 1860 written novel by Wilkie Collins takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!
short_description: Discover the secret of the mysterious woman in white in this hidden-object game. Based on the 1860 novel by Wilkie Collins, the game takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
